Hi i checked this, and i also
Can see the same also i check rich text field but nothing was there some fields having option like don’t show controls on page editor.
I think it had something to do with it being nested within certain fields? I don't know. I resolved this but I don't exactly remember how.

I need a module that will list 3 featured posts at the top (the first one full width, then 2 columns), then the rest of the posts below, most recent first, without duplicating the featured posts. They also want it to where if no featured posts are selected it just shows the latest 3 in the featured area and the rest below.

This seems fairly complicated.

Any guidance is appreciated!

I'm also open to purchasing a module that does this if it exists.
I can create like this for you, let’s discuss about this send me DM.
I can develop module for you in best quality with Responsive, let’s discuss about this send me DM.
